entity.name: subject
entity.query: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE isactive = true

entity.name: collection
entity.query: SELECT id, atomicnumber, published_id FROM collection WHERE isactive = true AND published_id is not null

entity.name: collectionversion
entity.query: SELECT title, description, type, id FROM collectionversion WHERE id=${collection.PUBLISHED_ID}${collection.published_id}

entity.name: collections_subjects
entity.query: SELECT * FROM collections_subjects WHERE collectionversion_id=${collectionversion.ID}${collectionversion.id}

entity.name: collectionsubjects
entity.query: SELECT label, term FROM subject WHERE id=${collections_subjects.SUBJECTS_ID}${collections_subjects.subjects_id} AND label != 'keyword'

entity.name: collectionkeywords
entity.query: SELECT term FROM subject WHERE id=${collections_subjects.SUBJECTS_ID}${collections_subjects.subjects_id} AND label = 'keyword'
